channel.title: Xlog glitch
channel.description: how do i fix it where players can't xlog or something it's a massive problem that allows them to dupe. like in the duel arena if 2 ppl fight and one of them stakes and x logs both of them get the item the winner and the one that logs so please help

item.title: Xlog glitch
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

There’s no way I can explain it to you. You’re just going to have to step through your code and add appropriate “if player disconnnected” checks and such where they should logically be.

Read full topic

item.title: Xlog glitch
item.dc:creator: @cardguydude cardguydude
item.description:
@cardguydude wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:2, topic:397035”][quote author=cardguydude link=topic=494190.msg3612880#msg3612880 date=1306730610]
how do i fix it where players can’t xlog or something it’s a massive problem that allows them to dupe. like in the duel arena if 2 ppl fight and one of them stakes and x logs both of them get the item the winner and the one that logs so please help
[/quote]

Proper programming would be the best suggestion I’d say.

Simply put: Validate the player states.[/quote]
i’m kinda new mind telling me in more detail o.o? or tell me exactly what to do please
(i know it’s spoon feeding but i’ve tried everything i know to do.)

Read full topic
